title: Replacement Pixel1 is unable to restore old Pixel1 backup from drive
content:
Have a Google Pixel1 (old one).
Google backup is configured and happening. 
Pixel Backup shows in Google Drive. 
Purchased a replacement Pixel1 (aka: "new") 
New Pixel, Setup "Let's copy your data" from the cloud doesn't find the old Pixel's backup. 
"Bring your data from ..." 
"G" A backup from the cloud - Sign in with google account that's used on "old pixel1" 
Getting Account info ... appears: 
Choose a backup to restore (appears) 
  - the pixel backup is not in the list. 
Why can't i restore backup from an old pixel to a new different replacement pixel?
